FlowGraph

Class ReactivePort<T>

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A reactive port that stores a value and notifies when it changes. Thread-safe for UI binding scenarios.

public sealed class ReactivePort<T> : IPortValue<T>, IPortValue, INotifyPropertyChanged

Type Parameters

T

The type of value this port holds.
